nodes.text: The Galaxies Opera House was located in the upper levels of the Uscru District on Coruscant and was owned by Romeo Treblanc.

This opera house was favored by Palpatine over the Coruscant Opera House frequented by his predecessor. Because of his patronage, and his gracious donations, the Supreme Chancellor received a private box within the upper stories of the main theater.

A pivotal meeting between Anakin Skywalker and Supreme Chancellor Palpatine was held here, in which Palpatine told Anakin the story of Darth Plagueis the Wise and brought Anakin a step closer to joining the Sith. During this meeting, important dignitaries watched an acrobatic performance by a Mon Calamari group of the opera Squid Lake.
